messages.message:
@Prakhar I never really got around to making this UI to work, but I ended up connecting to the DB from a Crafting sandbox. You can find the credentials in k8s:
```kubectl get secret db-backend-params -o jsonpath='{.data.db_string}' | base64 --decode```

> I have no context whatsoever on how our grafana instances are deployed and configured, nor how they interface with MySQL. I would recommend you reach out to the observability and/or backend teams for assistance with getting this resolved
@sean.donohoe Sure, I'll ask someone from observability then! Thanks!
Thanks for the alternative solution @Paul H, I'll give it a go.
